text: The plaintiff, under a claim to certain described premises, may recover less than the whole property claimed, and, under a claim to an entire property, may recover an undivided part thereof.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Ejectment and Other Real Property Actions. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Recovery of less than is claimed.
